nodes.text: Jorgis was a fighter pilot who served in the Rebel Alliance as a member of Green Group during the Galactic Civil War. In 3 ABY, Jorgis was stationed onboard the Mon Calamari cruiser Defiance after joining the Rebellion about same time as Ace Azzameen. The pilot's call sign was Green Seven. Jorgis sent an encouraging e-mail to Azzameen to establish a friendship; however he was killed shortly after. Jorgis was honored at a funeral service along with fellow pilots Gaad, L'Urak and Parch.
